class Student(object):
    def __init__(self):
        self._name = None
    @property
    def name(self):
        return self._name
    @name.setter
    def name(self, value):
    if value != 'xueweihan':
        self._name = value
    @name.deleter
    def name(self):
        print 'del name!'
        del self._name
s = Student()
s.name = 'aaa'

PY?=python

PELICANOPTS=

BASEDIR=$(CURDIR)
INPUTDIR=$(BASEDIR)/content
OUTPUTDIR=$(BASEDIR)/output
CONFFILE=$(BASEDIR)/pelicanconf.py

DEBUG ?= 0
ifeq ($(DEBUG), 1)
    PELICANOPTS += -D
endif

RELATIVE ?= 0
ifeq ($(RELATIVE), 1)

endif

html:

clean:
    [ ! -d $(OUTPUTDIR) ] || rm -rf $(OUTPUTDIR)

regenerate:
    $(PELICAN) -r $(INPUTDIR) -o $(OUTPUTDIR) -s $(CONFFILE) $(PELICANOPTS)

serve:
ifdef PORT
    cd $(OUTPUTDIR) && $(PY) -m pelican.server $(PORT)
else
    cd $(OUTPUTDIR) && $(PY) -m pelican.server
endif

publish:
    $(PELICAN) $(INPUTDIR) -o $(OUTPUTDIR) -s $(CONFFILE) $(PELICANOPTS)
